price: 19. Maar degenen die niet in Onze tekenen geloven, zijn degenen aan de linkerzijde.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
